channel.title: JournalLM
channel.description: I can't believe I'm doing this. Random journals + NotebookLM "podcasts" = this slop.

item.title: Daily Notes: April 5, 2024
item.description: These journal entries document the author's daily life, spanning several months. The entries blend personal reflections on health, finances, and relationships with details about hobbies such as tarot card readings and Magic: The Gathering. There are also notes on productivity, including the use of Obsidian note-taking software and attempts at improved organization. Financial tracking, particularly concerning stock performance and spending on card games, is a recurring theme. Finally, the author reflects on learning and knowledge management, expressing a need for improved note organization and deeper engagement with certain topics.
